pullrequest.title: Filesystem functions to create unique paths

content.raw:
I'm not sure why, but some of the files are not being removed in the windows test:

~~~
9: [ RUN      ] Filesystem.uniquePaths
9: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\Filesystem_TEST.cc(547): error: Value of: removeFile(newFileWithExt)
9:   Actual: false
9: Expected: true
9: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\Filesystem_TEST.cc(548): error: Value of: removeFile(fileExistingRt)
9:   Actual: false
9: Expected: true
9: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\Filesystem_TEST.cc(549): error: Value of: removeDirectory(dir)
9:   Actual: false
9: Expected: true
9: [  FAILED  ] Filesystem.uniquePaths (1 ms)
~~~

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/585/testReport/junit/(root)/Filesystem/uniquePaths/
